entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
